Package PDFjet.NET

Class Barcode2D

Object
PDFjet.NET.Barcode2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDrawable
public class Barcode2D extends Object implements IDrawable
Used to create PDF417 2D barcodes. Please see Example_12.

    • SetModuleWidth

      public void SetModuleWidth(float width)
      Sets the module width for this barcode. This changes the barcode size while preserving the aspect. Use value between 0.5f and 0.75f. If the value is too small some scanners may have difficulty reading the barcode.
      Parameters:
      width - the module width of the barcode.

    • DrawOn

      public float[] DrawOn(Page page) throws Exception
      Draws this barcode on the specified page.
      Specified by:
      DrawOn in interface IDrawable
      Parameters:
      page - the page to draw this barcode on.
      Returns:
      x and y coordinates of the bottom right corner of this component.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an input or output exception occurred
